# First things first {.unnumbered}

In this page, we make available a detailed explanation on how we constructed the ColoRectal Cancer (CRC) atlas of single-cell RNAseq (scRNAseq) data. This allows full reproducibility of the analysis performed.

You will find all the original code files in the [github project](https://github.com/saracardoso/CRC_ATLAS) of this atlas (also accessible through [Important Links](#important-links)).

::: {.rmdnote}
**NOTE**

All paths in this documentation can be changed for your case by only adapting `project_dir` variable to where the *CRC_ATLAS* directory is in your device.

```{r eval=FALSE}
# Project's path:
project_dir = '/home/scardoso/Documents/PhD/CRC_ATLAS'
```
:::

All the scRNAseq analysis was performed using the R language [@R-base], version 4.1.0. The packages used were the following: *Seurat* [@R-Seurat] (v.4.0.3), *SeuratDisk* [@R-SeuratDisk] (v.0.0.0.9019), *SeuratObject* [@R-SeuratObject] (v.4.0.2), *clustree* [@R-clustree] (v.0.4.3), *SIGMA* [@R-SIGMA] (v.0.0.0.1), *infercnv* [@R-infercnv] (v.1.8.0), and *CMScaller* [@R-CMScaller] (v.0.99.2).
